main.name: Bresly Bermana Perangin - angin
main.bio: HELLO EVERYONE! My name is Bresly Bermana Perangin-angin, you can call me Bresly. I am a Frontend Developer. I have experience working with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and ReactJS. I love to create beautiful and functional websites that provide an excellent user experience. In addition to my technical skills, I am also a great communicator and team player. I enjoy collaborating with others to achieve common goals and deliver high-quality results. When I'm not coding, I enjoy reading tech blogs, playing video games, and exploring new places.
